content.raw:
Hmm, that's a pity. 

Listening to `world_control` topic is no solution for me, since I reset the world using `gazebo_ros_pkgs`'s `/gazebo/reset_simulation`, which inside calls directly `_wolrd->Reset()` instead of using the Gazebo topic. So I can stay with calling the plugin's `Reset()` manually, but it is not that nice and is more error-prone.
